hero.title: Welcome to MetaIntelligence
hero.subtitle: We provide intelligent solutions to help businesses make better decisions.

identity.title: Identity
identity.content: We are a software development firm that identifies the essence of problems through deep insight and technical expertise, delivering practical value to clients based on engineering excellence.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To solve the problems facing humanity through profound insight and technology, ushering in an era where people can focus on what truly matters.

slogan.title: Slogan
slogan.content: Insight into Essence, Design for Value
